authentic-image-request.title: Load documents from authentic sources
authentic-image-request.description: Loads an official passport photo from a state authority.
authentic-image-request.request-success-body: The requested document will be retrieved as soon as it is available. You will be informed by e-mail about the further process.
authentic-image-request.request-text: For use at the TU Graz
authentic-image-request.not-available-text: Not available. Please contact the IT support
